Posts.Content: Mar 2, 2018 08:59PM Liahna wrote: When I was 49 and already in menopause, I was diagnosed with grade 1 stage 1 IDC with dcis. The tumor was approximately one cm. I'm now 63 years old. I refused radiation and hormonal therapy. I had no other treatment except a wide margin lumpectomy and biopsy track removal. I've never had a reoccurrence.
Posts.Title: Long Term Radiation Side Effects 10+ years After? Barbarella60 Raebrewster1971
